docs.snippet: WHEELING, West Va., July 25. -- Local labor leaders predict there will be a large attendance at the conference here Tuesday of the executive officers of the labor organizations of the country, called by President Ratchford of the Miners' Union.

headline.main: THE WHEELING CONFERENCE.; Large Attendance of Labor Leaders Expected -- Outcome Doubtful.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 6. -- The advance sheets of the summary of exports and imports as reported by the Bureau of Statistics of the Treasury Department, ending with June, completing the fiscal year, show that our exports have exceeded those of any former...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 6. -- The advance sheets of the summary of exports and imports as reported by the Bureau of Statistics of the Treasury Department, ending with June, completing the fiscal year, show that our exports have exceeded those of any former year, and that the exports of manufactured goods have been $276,357,861, an increase over the previous phenomenal year of $47,286,683.

headline.main: BIG INCREASE EXPORTS; For the Last Fiscal Year They Have Exceeded Those of Any Former Period. ENGLAND OUR BEST CUSTOMER South American Exports Fall Off -- Gains Over the Preceding Year in Asia, Africa, and Oceanica -- Cuba a Good Buyer.

docs.snippet: The news of the assassination of Senor Canovas del Castillo at Santa Aquada by the hand of an Anarchist aroused a feeling of profound consternation in the minds of prominent Spaniards in this city yesterday, and the impression that their country had...
docs.lead_paragraph: The news of the assassination of Senor Canovas del Castillo at Santa Aquada by the hand of an Anarchist aroused a feeling of profound consternation in the minds of prominent Spaniards in this city yesterday, and the impression that their country had suffered a calamity in his death was general.

headline.main: HIS DEATH A CALAMITY; The Assassination of the Spanish Premier So Regarded by Spaniards in This City. VIEWS OF CONSUL BALDASANO Says He Was Considered the Greatest Man in Spain and Was Active in the Suppression of Anarchists -- Cubans Hopeful.
